html:
2.19.18  1:11 am   bill could you please release via hyperlink the hundred years war bit you cut from hotewig? please please please, it can just be audio

     it never got put in the video. it was cut during the writing stages

2.19.18  12:34 am   i've been wondering if i'm the only sentient person on earth because i cannot read minds. Any proof that you're sentient too?

     if your question is proof that you are, then i think the contents of this website should be at least sufficient proof that i am

2.19.18  12:28 am   What is the meaning of doors?

     you can go through walls

     and hallways?

      you can browse for new walls to go through

2.18.18  11:23 pm   all of Life feels like a race to get shit done and I feel as though I am constantly losing but then ill fuck up and do something cool and great and people will tell me im in the lead but I still won't feel like it. but how do I know when Im in the lead otherwise

     you can never know for sure, and some times it's best not to know

2.18.18  11:13 pm   are you really going to make a full album?

     i think i prefer to release songs individually

2.18.18  10:17 pm   ive seen planes in several of your videos do you like planes

     they are ok

2.18.18  10:11 pm   Why do you always type in all lowercase?

     why do you never notice any of the capitals, including the ones on the button right below where you typed your question

2.18.18  8:12 pm   are your videos meant to be funny, bill?

     i'm just trying to be reasonable, pam

2.18.18  7:43 pm   how do i make art that doesn't feel stupid? should i accept that my art is stupid? what does stupid mean in the first damn place?

     i don't know but you should keep making many different things. it will be fun and you will find new and exciting ways to be stupid and smart, and much more

2.18.18  7:20 pm   What makes you nostalgic?

     thinking about past times

2.18.18  7:08 pm   what was the person in the unboxing video wondering about?​

     if they should open the box that says 'do not open'

2.18.18  6:40 pm   why do some people think humanity is fucked up?

     maybe because it is too powerful

2.18.18  6:34 pm   what colour is tuesday?

     it is multi colored

2.18.18  6:26 pm   What does it mean to be alive?

      you can move

2.18.18  5:54 pm   In your song "i want to be a movie star" the first time you sing the chorus at 48 seconds in are you referencing the end of the movie "The Truman show"?.

     no

2.18.18  5:05 pm   hey bill, i just noticed that you've started selling merch, hows that been going for you?

     i haven't checked

2.18.18  4:53 pm   Are your notes like a diary for when you're blazed out of your mind?

     oh, some one is catching on

2.18.18  4:41 pm   Do you double check all your answers before you publish them?

     after

2.18.18  4:39 pm   Is love real?

     yes

2.18.18  4:22 pm   How do you feel about freshly ground black pepper?

     pretty good

2.18.18  4:21 pm   WHO THE FUCK INVENTED ALL THE THINGS IT'S CRAZY

     must have been you

2.18.18  4:11 pm   have you ever used magic symbols in your videos to cast a spell of success and beauty on them?

     i try to do that with everything in the video, not just symbols

2.18.18  4:08 pm   Is there gonna be any sexy horn stabs in this next track? I always love how sparingly and tastily they stab.

     maybe

2.18.18  3:40 pm   Can you make a song that describes the amount of fun you're having?

     it feels like i do that with every song

2.18.18  3:35 pm   what was happened if communism successful

     then there would be some communist countries in the world

2.18.18  3:25 pm   do you rape pizza

     i always ask for consent, before fucking a pizza

2.18.18  3:04 pm   can you protect me from the protection?

     i will try

2.18.18  2:49 pm   do you ever just implement stuff

     oh hell yeah

2.18.18  2:45 pm   fish or birds

     sure

2.18.18  2:38 pm   can you speak any animal langauges

     sure

2.18.18  2:17 pm   Is it weird that I freaking love your content? XD

     do you think it's weird that i made it

2.18.18  2:16 pm   would you recommend going to school for music?

     no

      it seems like you didn't like it that much.

     that's not how i learned music

     i want to learn about music but i wanna learn about it 'my way' if that makes sense?

     of course. you should get started whenever you can

      tell me u can relate and what the fuvk should i do about college

     why do you have to do something about college

2.18.18  1:33 pm   got a sec?

     hi

2.18.18  1:32 pm   Bass (fish) or bass (indstrument)?

     they are both

2.18.18  1:09 pm   is there nothing?

     sure, and something

      was there ever nothing?

     yes, and something

      will there ever be nothing

     yes, and something

2.18.18  12:34 pm   why do you think that people think there are metaphors and secret hidden meanings in your content? (that your depressed, or nihilistic, or whatever)

     they are probably jealous that i am having too much fun

2.18.18  11:44 am   the snail time video made me really sad. why did you do it?

     i did not intend for that video to make you sad but if you want i can try to get you a refund

2.18.18  11:34 am   Do you have any tips on how to make a tasty mean lasagna? 

     no

2.18.18  11:30 am   can you whistle

     not really

2.18.18  11:21 am   Do you prefer Jeffrey, Jeffery, Geoffrey, or Geoffery?

     how about bill

2.18.18  10:53 am   How do you deal with sefl-hatred?

     try to be how i want to be

2.18.18  10:46 am   where do you draw your confidence from

     the big bang, i suppose

2.18.18  10:44 am   have you ever thought about landscaping?

     no

2.18.18  10:29 am   your last note was in march last year. are you ever going to post any ever??

     i post them all the time. there must be hundreds up there. are you ever going to notice

2.18.18  10:06 am   do you always think in harmonics?

     no

2.18.18  9:43 am   What kind of late night snack did you get in New Canaan? (And by late night I mean middle of the afternoon)

     songwriting

2.18.18  9:39 am   Do you think that humanity still exists?

     oh hell yeah. it's just getting started

2.18.18  9:13 am   what do they put in the news when there's no news?

     the worst stuff they can find, like accidents and fights and stuff

2.18.18  8:58 am   Can you turn on CAPS LOCK and just leave it on?

     not right now

2.18.18  8:55 am   Do you think a meteor will hit earth in approximately 834,26 seconds?

     no but i can't be sure
